page_title: Dylan RAKOTONARIVO - Developer, Designer, Public Speaker
meta_description: This is my portfolio website, where you can find my projects, skills, and experiences. Feel free to explore and get to know me better. Come and reach out to me!
description_text: This is my portfolio website, where you can find my projects, skills, and experiences. Feel free to explore and get to know me better. Come and reach out to me!
news_description: I have successfully defended my thesis on "Report Writing using Artificial Intelligence" and graduated with a Bachelor's degree from the ENI in Fianarantsoa. This achievement marks a significant milestone in my academic journey.
profile_li_1: Passionate digital solutions creator, immersed in software engineering.
profile_li_2: Skilled in hands-on web development with emerging technologies.
profile_li_3: Experienced in web design, bringing concepts to life.
education_eni_li_1: Studying Software Engineering & Database Management at ENI Fianarantsoa.
education_eni_li_2: Daily building expertise in robust software solutions.
education_pepito_li_1: Graduated with honors from 'La Pépito' French School.
education_pepito_li_2: Acquired strong French language and communication skills.
education_pepito_li_3: Focused on expressive communication in secondary studies.
experience_internships_li_1: Gained valuable experience via enriching internships.
experience_internships_li_2: Developed dynamic web solutions for management systems.
experience_internships_li_3: Applied knowledge to technical challenges using data systems & AI.
experience_projects_li_1: Innovatively developed projects like a hospital alert system.
experience_projects_li_2: Explored diverse development, turning ideas into impactful solutions.
experience_projects_li_3: Seeking challenges to expand skills & create meaningful applications.
experience_contests_li_1: Thrived in collaborative environments, such as Game Jams.
experience_contests_li_2: Applied skills to collective projects during intense experiences.
services_description: I provide services for those looking to build a new website, create engaging visuals, or improve their public speaking skills.
service_web_dev_desc: I create custom web applications and websites that are secure and user-friendly, bringing clients' vision to life.
service_web_design_desc: I design intuitive interfaces to enhance user experience, working independently or in collaboration.
service_creative_visuals_desc: I offer graphic design services, including brochures and social media graphics, to help clients communicate their message.
service_public_speaking_desc: I help individuals become effective communicators, equipping them with the tools to inspire their audience.
